news.title: Intellexa’s Predator spyware used to hack iPhone of journalist in Angola, research says
news.summary: Amnesty International says it found evidence that a government customer of Intellexa, a sanctioned surveillance vendor, used its Predator spyware against a prominent journalist in Angola.

news.title: Jack Altman joins Benchmark as GP
news.summary: Jack Altman and Benchmark announced today that he would be joining the firm as a general partner.

news.title: Ford turns to F1 and bounties to build a $30,000 electric truck
news.summary: A combination of 3D-printed Lego-like parts, Formula 1 thinking, and a bounty program will help the company hit that target. The team, led by Tesla veteran Alan Clarke, is obsessed with efficiency.

news.title: Meta’s own research found parental supervision doesn’t really help curb teens’ compulsive social media use
news.summary: An internal research study at Meta found that parental supervision may not help teens regulate their social media, and teens with trauma are more inclined to overuse social media.

news.summary: As the AI hardware space heats up, the iPhone maker has multiple smart products in development.

news.title: Meta’s new deal with Nvidia buys up millions of AI chips
news.summary: Meta has struck a multiyear deal to expand its data centers with millions of Nvidia's Grace and Vera CPUs and Blackwell and Rubin GPUs.
